reviewText: In today's economy, finding a job is something almost all of will have to do.  This DVD, or the information on it can help us, or help us to help those we love, like our children or friends.  Using the strategies found here, the job finder can better his/her situation.  Dr Green is a noted lecturer on the topic, and gives ideas that are current with today's situation.  I bought this for my older son and he found it very useful.
